description.name: cbbtcbase
description.tagline: CBBTC base Crypto Payment Gateway (No KYC)
description.long: Crypto base-cbbtc Paymnet Gateway with instant payouts to your walllet without KYC
features: Accept CBBTC base directly on your website
Unique base/cbbtc receiving address for every order
Instant payouts settlement to your base/cbbtc wallet
ZERO KYC for both the merchant and the customer.
